document_data.name: Schonert
document_data.mainbody: '''Schonert''' was a priest of [[Ilmater]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: Around 1479 DR, Schonert noticed that many residents of [[Downshadow]] had disappeared while rumors had spread of a treasure in the area. He decided to hire an adventuring party to uncover the truth.
document_data.Activities: Schonert usually sent food and supplies to the Downshadow folks.
